title: 83/297/EEC: Commission Decision of 6 June 1983 extending for the United Kingdom, in respect of a variety, the period provided for in Article 15 (1) of Directive 70/457/EEC (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 6 June 1983
extending for the United Kingdom, in respect of a variety, the period provided for in Article 15 (1) of Directive 70/457/EEC
(Only the English text is authentic)
(83/297/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The time limit specified in Article 15 (1) of Directive 70/457/EEC is, where the United Kingdom is concerned, extended from 31 March 1983 to 30 September 1983 in respect of the variety Inca (Lolium Ă hybridum).
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 June 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
